The Power of Goroutines

Go · Concurrency February 17, 2026

Goroutines are Lightweight

Unlike OS threads, goroutines are managed by the Go runtime and start with a very small stack size. This allows you to run millions of them in a single program.

Performance Comparison

Feature OS Thread Goroutine
Startup Slow Fast
Memory ~1MB ~2KB
Context Switch Expensive Cheap
